verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <WH6160> be-'ar-Vot in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> mo-'Av; of Moab עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> yar-Den by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <WH3405> ye-re-Cho [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

צַו֮ <WH6680> tzav Command אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְנָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> ve-na-te-Nu that they give לַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim, unto the Levites מִֽנַּחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> min-na-cha-Lat of the inheritance אֲחֻזָּתָ֖ם <WH272> 'a-chuz-za-Tam of their possession עָרִ֣ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities לָשָׁ֑בֶת <WH3427> la-Sha-vet; to dwell in וּמִגְרָ֗שׁ <WH4054> u-mig-Rash, suburbs לֶֽעָרִים֙ <WH5892> le-'a-Rim for the cities סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5439> se-vi-Vo-tei-Hem, round about תִּתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu and ye shall give לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim. [also] unto the Levites

וְהָי֧וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become הֶֽעָרִ֛ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim And the cities לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לָשָׁ֑בֶת <WH3427> la-Sha-vet; shall they have to dwell in וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <WH4054> u-mig-re-shei-Hem, and the suburbs יִהְי֤וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu shall be for לִבְהֶמְתָּם֙ <WH929> liv-hem-Tam of them shall be for their cattle וְלִרְכֻשָׁ֔ם <WH7399> ve-lir-chu-Sham, and for their goods וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> u-le-Chol and for all חַיָּתָֽם׃ <WH2416> chai-ya-Tam. and for all their beasts

וּמִגְרְשֵׁי֙ <WH4054> u-mig-re-Shei And the suburbs הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim, of the cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim; unto the Levites מִקִּ֤יר <WH7023> mik-Kir [shall reach] from the wall הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> ha-'Ir of the city וָח֔וּצָה <WH2351> va-Chu-tzah, and outward אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef a thousand אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. round about

וּמַדֹּתֶ֞ם <WH4058> u-mad-do-Tem And ye shall measure מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> mi-Chutz from without לָעִ֗יר <WH5892> la-'Ir, the city אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side קֵ֣דְמָה <WH6924> Ke-de-mah on the east אַלְפַּ֪יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֟ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah cubits וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side נֶגֶב֩ <WH5045> ne-Gev and on the south אַלְפַּ֨יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand בָּאַמָּ֜ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah cubits וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side יָ֣ם׀ <WH3220> yam and on the west אַלְפַּ֣יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֗ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> ve-'Et פְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> pe-'At side צָפ֛וֹן <WH6828> tza-Fon and on the north אַלְפַּ֥יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand בָּאַמָּ֖ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah cubits וְהָעִ֣יר <WH5892> ve-ha-'Ir and the city בַּתָּ֑וֶךְ <WH8432> bat-Ta-vech; [shall be] in the midst זֶ֚ה <WH2088> zeh This יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh shall become לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, מִגְרְשֵׁ֖י <WH4054> mig-re-Shei this shall be to them the suburbs הֶעָרִֽים׃ <WH5892> he-'a-Rim. of the cities

וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> ve-'Et הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim, And among the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim, unto the Levites אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> shesh- [there shall be] six עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> 'a-Rei cities הַמִּקְלָ֔ט <WH4733> ham-mik-Lat, for refuge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנ֔וּ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu, which ye shall appoint לָנֻ֥ס <WH5127> la-Nus that he may flee שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah for הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach; for the manslayer וַעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> va-'a-lei-Hem addition תִּתְּנ֔וּ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu, thither and to them ye shall add אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> u-she-Ta-yim and two עִֽיר׃ <WH5892> 'Ir. cities

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All הֶעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim, [So] all the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim, to the Levites אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im [shall be] forty וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <WH8083> u-she-mo-Neh and eight עִ֑יר <WH5892> 'Ir; cities אֶתְהֶ֖ן <WH853> 'et-Hen וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <WH4054> mig-re-shei-Hen. them [shall ye give] with their suburbs

וְהֶֽעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> ve-he-'a-Rim, And the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu which ye shall give מֵאֲחֻזַּ֣ת <WH272> me-'a-chuz-Zat [shall be] of the possession בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֵאֵ֤ת <WH853> me-'Et הָרַב֙ <WH7227> ha-Rav from [them that have] many תַּרְבּ֔וּ <WH7235> tar-Bu, ye shall give many וּמֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> u-me-'Et הַמְעַ֖ט <WH4592> ham-'At but from [them that have] few תַּמְעִ֑יטוּ <WH4591> tam-'I-tu; ye shall give few אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, every one כְּפִ֤י <WH6310> ke-Fi according נַחֲלָתוֹ֙ <WH5159> na-cha-la-To to his inheritance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יִנְחָ֔לוּ <WH5157> yin-Cha-lu, which he inheriteth יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> yit-Ten shall give מֵעָרָ֖יו <WH5892> me-'a-Rav of his cities לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim. unto the Levites פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem; to כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki When אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH5674> 'oe-Rim unto them When ye be come over אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den Jordan אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah into the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וְהִקְרִיתֶ֤ם <WH7136> ve-hik-ri-Tem Then ye shall appoint לָכֶם֙ la-Chem עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim, you cities עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> 'a-Rei to be cities מִקְלָ֖ט <WH4733> mik-Lat of refuge תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <WH1961> tih-Yei-nah become לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; וְנָ֥ס <WH5127> ve-Nas may flee שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> Sham-mah there רֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> ro-Tze-ach, for you that the slayer מַכֵּה־ <WH5221> mak-keh- thither which killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh any person בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <WH7684> bish-ga-Gah. at unawares

וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become לָכֶ֧ם la-Chem הֶעָרִ֛ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim And they shall be unto you cities לְמִקְלָ֖ט <WH4733> le-mik-Lat for refuge מִגֹּאֵ֑ל <WH1350> mig-go-'El; from the avenger וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo will not יָמוּת֙ <WH4191> ya-Mut die הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach, that the manslayer עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until עָמְד֛וֹ <WH5975> a-me-Do not until he stand לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah the congregation לַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> lam-mish-Pat. in judgment

וְהֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> ve-he-'a-Rim And of these cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּתֵּ֑נוּ <WH5414> tit-Te-nu; which ye shall give שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> shesh- six עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> 'a-Rei cities מִקְלָ֖ט <WH4733> mik-Lat shall ye have for refuge תִּהְיֶ֥ינָה <WH1961> tih-Yei-nah become לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

אֵ֣ת׀ <WH853> 'et שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three הֶעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim, cities תִּתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu Ye shall give מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> me-'E-ver on this side לַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> lai-yar-Den, Jordan וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh and three הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim, cities תִּתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> tit-te-Nu shall ye give בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> 'a-Rei [which] shall be cities מִקְלָ֖ט <WH4733> mik-Lat of refuge תִּהְיֶֽינָה׃ <WH1961> tih-Yei-nah. become

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei [both] for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְלַגֵּ֤ר <WH1616> ve-lag-Ger and for the stranger וְלַתּוֹשָׁב֙ <WH8453> ve-lat-to-Shav and for the sojourner בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <WH8432> be-to-Cham, among תִּהְיֶ֛ינָה <WH1961> tih-Yei-nah become שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> shesh- These six הֶעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh These לְמִקְלָ֑ט <WH4733> le-mik-Lat; shall be a refuge לָנ֣וּס <WH5127> la-Nus may flee שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah, there כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- anyone מַכֵּה־ <WH5221> mak-keh- them that every one that killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh any person בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <WH7684> bish-ga-Gah. unawares

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if בִּכְלִ֨י <WH3627> bich-Li him with an instrument בַרְזֶ֧ל׀ <WH1270> var-Zel of iron הִכָּ֛הוּ <WH5221> hik-Ka-hu And if he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <WH4191> vai-ya-Mot so that he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <WH7523> ro-Tze-ach he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <WH1931> Hu; he מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <WH4191> yu-Mat be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach. the murderer

וְאִ֡ם <WH518> ve-'Im If בְּאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> be-'E-ven a stone יָד֩ <WH3027> yad him with throwing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יָמ֨וּת <WH4191> ya-Mut wherewith he may die בָּ֥הּ bah הִכָּ֛הוּ <WH5221> hik-Ka-hu And if he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <WH4191> vai-ya-Mot and he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <WH7523> ro-Tze-ach he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <WH1931> Hu; he מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <WH4191> yu-Mat be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach. the murderer

א֡וֹ <WH176> o Or בִּכְלִ֣י <WH3627> bich-Li weapon עֵֽץ־ <WH6086> 'etz- of wood יָד֩ <WH3027> yad him with an hand אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יָמ֨וּת <WH4191> ya-Mut wherewith he may die בּ֥וֹ bo הִכָּ֛הוּ <WH5221> hik-Ka-hu Or [if] he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <WH4191> vai-ya-Mot and he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <WH7523> ro-Tze-ach he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <WH1931> Hu; he מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <WH4191> yu-Mat be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach. the murderer

גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> go-'El The revenger הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> had-Dam, of blood ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu him he יָמִ֖ית <WH4191> ya-Mit himself shall slay אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach; the murderer בְּפִגְעוֹ־ <WH6293> be-fig-'ov- when he meeteth ב֖וֹ vo ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu himself יְמִיתֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH4191> ye-mi-Ten-nu. shall slay

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- If בְּשִׂנְאָ֖ה <WH8135> be-sin-'Ah him of hatred יֶהְדָּפֶ֑נּוּ <WH1920> yeh-da-Fen-nu; But if he thrust אֽוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> hish-Lich or hurl עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and בִּצְדִיָּ֖ה <WH6660> bitz-di-Yah at him by laying of wait וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> vai-ya-Mot. that he die

א֣וֹ <WH176> o or בְאֵיבָ֞ה <WH342> ve-'ei-Vah Or in enmity הִכָּ֤הוּ <WH5221> hik-Ka-hu smite בְיָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ve-ya-Do him with his hand וַיָּמֹ֔ת <WH4191> vai-ya-Mot, that he die מֽוֹת־ <WH4191> mot- [him] shall surely יוּמַ֥ת <WH4191> yu-Mat be put to death הַמַּכֶּ֖ה <WH5221> ham-mak-Keh he that smote רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <WH7523> ro-Tze-ach [for] he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <WH1931> Hu; he גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> go-'El the revenger הַדָּ֗ם <WH1818> had-Dam, of blood יָמִ֛ית <WH4191> ya-Mit shall slay אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָרֹצֵ֖חַ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach the murderer בְּפִגְעוֹ־ <WH6293> be-fig-'ov- when he meeteth בֽוֹ׃ vo.

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if בְּפֶ֥תַע <WH6621> be-Fe-ta' him suddenly בְּלֹא־ <WH3808> be-lo- without אֵיבָ֖ה <WH342> 'ei-Vah enmity הֲדָפ֑וֹ <WH1920> ha-da-Fo; But if he thrust אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> hish-Lich or have cast עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any כְּלִ֖י <WH3627> ke-Li upon him any thing בְּלֹ֥א <WH3808> be-Lo without צְדִיָּֽה׃ <WH6660> tze-di-Yah. without laying of wait

א֣וֹ <WH176> o or בְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol- any אֶ֜בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven Or with any stone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- him יָמ֥וּת <WH4191> ya-Mut wherewith a man may die בָּהּ֙ bah בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> be-Lo [him] not רְא֔וֹת <WH7200> re-'ot, seeing וַיַּפֵּ֥ל <WH5307> vai-yap-Pel and cast עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav on וַיָּמֹ֑ת <WH4191> vai-ya-Mot; [it] upon him that he die וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> ve-Hu he לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor אוֹיֵ֣ב <WH341> o-Yev and [was] not his enemy ל֔וֹ lo, וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> me-vak-Kesh neither sought רָעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH7451> ra-'a-To. his harm

וְשָֽׁפְטוּ֙ <WH8199> ve-sha-fe-Tu shall judge הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, Then the congregation בֵּ֚ין <WH996> bein between הַמַּכֶּ֔ה <WH5221> ham-mak-Keh, between the slayer וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> u-Vein between גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> go-'El and the revenger הַדָּ֑ם <WH1818> had-Dam; of blood עַ֥ל <WH5921> 'al according הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <WH4941> ham-mish-pa-Tim according to these judgments הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. to these
